documents.document: Apple maps had my bus route programmed into it. That's well impressive. Plus it knows where I work. That's a bit scary, I never told it.
In the back end of Edinburgh. Ain't no body got time for that.
Let's just hope I end up somewhere close to haymarket!
Trams aren't working this morning. Having to make my first venture onto Edinburgh buses. Changed once already - let's go.
@LastSaveLoaded took Colm's advice and started Glitch, quite like it. And carried on with season 6 of GoT. #blood #boobs #shame
@LastSaveLoaded I've recently watched The Crying Game, finished S4 of House of Cards, can't wait for season 5. Started the walking dead.
@Solm67 lol I thought you'd come back with that. I saw them live when I was about 20 and could take it in the mosh pit-I got quite bruised!
Wish the Pats would come to UK again :( loved seeing them last time! https://t.co/HQs2Cq1QF8
@Solm67 Oh it can. Try Mayhem. 😂
@Solm67 oooo I like that band. You should go really heavy and listen to the Dillinger escape plan.
Can't remember the last time I got to leave work at 5 (on time) - ready and waiting for tram time. Let's go.
@Solm67 @Laura_69 you'll have to grow your hair long soon Colm! 🤘😂
@Solm67 haha good man. Try 'good mourning america' on the same album. That's a great track.
@Solm67 Love me some GnR! If only I was rich I could go see the original line-up now it's touring again.
@Solm67 lol - a new section... 'Colm's descent into Head-banging' - have to find some suitable heavy intro music! 😂
@Solm67 lol keep listening - you'll learn to love it. I'll make a headbanger out of you yet! Try LetLive you might like that, bit softer.
Back on the @Architectsuk train today. Still loving the album.
Wow - she's a beast with the come backs! Love it https://t.co/aIdOAh1Ezk
@kungfufuzz what you seeing?
@NatsMcNeish fiery redhead.....
@Solm67 Depends if you like screamy heavy metal. If you do then get on it, if not, maybe start on something light and work up! 🤘😁
@VeryBritishLife Thank you! :)
Finally giving the new 'architects' album a go. Bang - it's awesome! Get on it people.
Only my daughter sits in McDonald's dancing in her high chair to Olly Murs. #specialgirl
Out for a walk whilst the lady sleeps off a night shift. @Solm67 and @Onyersix keeping me company on @LastSaveLoaded - Thanks fellas.
@Solm67 amen to that! 🔪
@Solm67 too true. Not sure which is worse!
@Solm67 sad times. Clearly 2017 is gonna roll on 2016 style 😱
John hurt died? Oh no! :(
Ava seems to be going off quicker than normal! Yay. PlayStation session I think tonight, long time since the last one.
That's it. I'm done with client reporting at BlackRock. Sad times! On to Security Lending. Hi ho.
@Solm67 Thanks mate! Jumping into the deep end come Monday! 🙈😂
Last day in my old job. Moving floor and teams tonight. SO much to do today before I finish though. Ouch.
@LastSaveLoaded this week, I've started Alan Wake, and back the future ep 1. Trying to clear a bit of my immense backlog (400 games to go!)🙈
Figured out my sky box pin, so can finally watch the Xmas Jonathan Creek special. Love this show.
Willing my daughter to sleep so I can cook dinner. #hungrymofo
The Spanish offering a deal to Gib to stay in the EU if they come over to the Spanish. Gibs reply - not a chance son. Cheeky cheeky. 😂
Just watched a bit more #Frequency whilst I ate my lunch. Man I love that show. The story is so good!
@Solm67 It was too early in the morning for cuddles. ThAt time of the morning is for hand-holding only! 😎
@NatsMcNeish you are looking for a husband in the wrong places. Try Harrods!
Empty tram. Some guy gets on with me and decides he wants to squash into a double seat with me. And then wonders why I give him a row. Dick.
@Solm67 @NatsMcNeish Always. Trying to fit in with the scots here, maybe they won't realise I'm an English. 🙈
@NatsMcNeish remember for next year ;)
Thanks @NatsMcNeish - Christ it tastes good. #merryxmas
Thanks @NatsMcNeish - Christ it tastes good. #merryxmas https://t.co/EfBqVxmEIh
@nicolalalalala lol I wouldnt have got away with that back in my day! Glad I'm not alone is suffering these things!
@nicolalalalala amen to that. That and the refusing to eat dinner!
@nicolalalalala This. Everyday. 😣
She's a #metallica fan 🤘#sandm https://t.co/rKlF9jZzuf
Started a new series. An old one from the sky box we had recorded. ' new blood'. It's ok, but a bit weird!
Bloody hell I've forgotten my sky box PIN number. Can't watch Jonathan Creek :(
@Solm67 oh no that's awful, hate spoilers! I just read up on wiki, Turns out it wasn't a big hit in U.K. Can't imagine why.... lol
@Solm67 yep - but only by about 2 seconds lol. Nearly got me!
@Solm67 well that was different! I enjoyed it though, not my normal type of film for sure!
@Solm67 Haha you'll outlive us all!
@Solm67 You might by be around - you'll be nearly 70! 🙈😂
@Solm67 thanks man, let's hope I can stay awake. Or it might have to be a two night job lol - I'm getting old too!
@Solm67 oh it says 1997 on the sky box, I was 6 then! I thought it looked 'old' for 1997!
@Solm67 1997 - I was 11 ;) but I've honestly never heard of this film before at all! Recorded it off the sky box.
@Solm67 oooo now I'm intrigued!
Watching 'The Crying Game' - I know absolutely nothing about this film. Let's go.
@LastSaveLoaded I started the fresh prince of bel air on Netflix too. I think Colm should attempt the intro rap. In full. #doit
@LastSaveLoaded I watched Sherlock - loved it. Hunger games 3 part 1, the purge anarchy. Also contributed House of cards season 4.
He-man is on @NetflixUK - yes! Loved this show as a kid. Now for them to add #MastersoftheUniverse and all would be complete!
Watching #TheUndateables - love this show. It makes me happy to see it work out for them!
@zachinglis the opening of 2 is so fun.
Totally in love with LetLive. Such good songs. All thanks to @NotMetalPod and their top albums of 2016. Cheers guys.
Started listening to LetLive today. I really like that band!
Blasting out @blackpeaks again whilst I work. I've said it before but... what a bloody good album.
Loving the last episode of this series of Sherlock. Like a clever version of Saw!
@ananyah ah man. Guess it's an excuse for a weekend away! Lol
@ananyah oh wow didn't realise this was coming to the UK. Hope it comes to Scotland at some point!
@piersmorgan Tony Blair... 11. Haha love it.
Death in Paridise. Season 3 ep. 6
@Solm67 lol think that's fair!
@Solm67 haha I've never seen that so can't comment. But yeah I was a bit bored!
@hiDaniell always classy! 😂
Just watched the hunger games 3 part 1. Didn't like it. The first two were much better. I fell asleep twice in it!
@Solm67 best way to be! Old is boring! 😂 lol
Hahaha putting snapchat filters on people on the tv is sooo fun!
Moved onto #TheDailyShow - bloody love it!
Been out for a Chinese. Now watching the end of GoT season 5... it's the 'shame' scene. #shame #dingding
Snow!!!! #winteriscoming
GoT season 5 Ep 10 - finale. That flame priest is mental!
@VeryBritishLife @Airwavescast @sfdrummer @Tone7x20 yay - great news! 👍
@Airwavescast are you guys going to do a new episode in 2017? @VeryBritishLife @sfdrummer @Tone7x20 #fingerscrossed
Epic rap battles of history - Jack the Ripper vs. Hannibal Lector. Seen it loads and still love it. Lector wins by a mile I think! 🔪😱
In love with that Alan Walker song - Alone. #deskraving
@LastSaveLoaded fight fight fight! #round1dingding
@LastSaveLoaded The last stand, the blindside and love actually (it was Xmas!) Oh and a bit more of season 4 of house of cards. All done! 😘
@LastSaveLoaded Tour, I like that. Carried on with season 1 of shooter, designated survivor and Frequency. And a few films: police academy 2
@LastSaveLoaded started Preacher, but didn't like it. Started Arrow and really liked that, done 4 episodes so far. Also watched The Grand
@LastSaveLoaded finished season 4 of GoT and half of Season 5 - what a show! Carried on with season 4 of Person of Interest
@LastSaveLoaded long list from me this week thanks to the holiday break. I finished off Homeland season 1, a few more House season 1
Made a roast gammon risotto last night. Just had the leftovers for lunch. It as awesome - I smashed it. #egobuilding
Listening to an old @SwordAndScale episode on HH Holmes. Interesting theory so far on him being Jack the Ripper. Enjoying it so far!
Game of thrones - S5 E8 (Hardhome) - what an ending. Creepy as hell. And that white walker is kick ass. Loved that episode.
@LastSaveLoaded game of thrones the tell tale series on steam. a few odd ones in the weekly steam sale, total about £30 for about 20games
Woke up a bit early for work, so just finished off 'The Blind Side' what a great film!
@Solm67 @TrevDXB Ah nice, I'll that a go today too. Thanks guys! 😁
